name: fastmail-calendar
description: Claude Cowork plugin for Fastmail calendar integration via CalDAV

scripts.build: esbuild servers/fastmail-calendar-server.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --outfile=servers/fastmail-calendar-server.bundle.mjs
